Report.Query: SELECT yearmonth AS OperatingMonth, route_name AS RouteName, avg_station_distance AS AverageDistance, area_code AS AreaCode, org_group_id AS ParentOrgId, org_group AS ParentOrgName, row_number() over (order by route_name) as RowNumber, count(*) over () as TotalItems, avg(avg_station_distance) OVER () as TotalAverageDistance FROM rpt_netoper_avgdistance
